author: James Bradley
text:
The border is not open because we have a broken immigration system. 

The border is open because we have a BROKEN government.

author: Catherine
text: A horrible murder of 3 Kurds in Paris. This is the aftermath. Mass immigration DOES NOT WORK & has been a disaster in France.

author: Qasim Rashid, Esq.
text:
Asylum is legal immigration. 
There's no "port of entry" requirement.
There's no "visa" requirement.
There's no "first country" requirement.
You enter the United States, and you apply for asylum. 
Because asylum is legal immigration. Period.

Period.

author: Concerned Canadian
text: Paris once of the most iconic cities in the world has “fallen” -the result of a misguided humanitarian immigration policy that allowed mass migration with no vetting & allowed microcosms with no adaptation ! Canada next?

author: Arash Azizzada
text:
a reminder that congress passed $1.1 trillion dollars for cops and the us military, much of it being used to brutalize black and brown folks here and abroad, while it managed to not include any immigration relief for newly arrived afghans. 

pathetic & deeply offensive.

author: Ricci Wynne
Dr. Pennsylvania Adams
text: This is what Justin Trudeau wants for Canada by overpopulating the entire country with his psychotic immigration policies that aren't even remotely sustainable in Canada. Especially when his cabinet is looting every penny this country has daily in front of us.

author: Rep. Jim Jordan
text:
We saw record illegal immigration in 2022. 

If Title 42 ends, it’s going to get even worse in 2023.

author: Geert Wilders
text:
The people have been represented by weak and corrupt leaders. We need better, stronger leaders to tackle immigration and stop islamization, so we have to win elections and take leadership!

On 
@tv7israelnews
 Europa.

author: Priti Gandhi - प्रीति गांधी
text:
One week after the Moroccans destroyed Paris following the World Cup defeat, now the Turkish & Syrian Kurds have gone on a rampage along with other immigrants. 

Thanks to their flawed immigration policies, today, the vibrant city of Paris is in absolute tatters. Sad!!

author: chris cantú
text:
MF DOOM was prevented from returning to the US by the Obama administration due to his immigration status. He was born in the UK but grew up in New York. 

He never set foot in the US after 2012.

Insane that he's including one of his last features on this list.

author: GB News
text:
‘Keir Starmer is the chief architect of Project Rejoin.’

Conservative MP Marco Longhi says Keir Starmer is playing a ‘clever game’ on immigration, but remains committed to ‘getting back into the EU’.

 GB News YouTube: https://bit.ly/3vAYaw0

author: Bisou
text: You got a job at immigration?

author: EnochPowell
text:
The USA could end illegal immigration overnight, if it wanted to. 

"In three months time, any business or private person knowingly employing illegal workers will be fined $5,000 per worker, per day, with 50% of the total fine given to any whistleblower, tax free"

author: FAIR
text:
"Border crossings could “easily” approach 12 million during Biden’s four years in office." 
@DailyCaller

author: Andrea Junker
text: Did you know? Section 274(a)(1)(A)(ii) of the Immigration and Nationality Act makes it a federal crime to knowingly transport undocumented persons across state lines. — Greg Abbott should be arrested immediately.

author: Law Boy, Esq.
text: the Supreme Court has struck down all manner of executive action on the basis that the government is overusing its COVID powers, but will keep COVID-based immigration policies in place **against the government's will** for over a year

author: Adriano Espaillat
text:
Democrats are willing to have the conversation. Yet, the issue of immigration is weaponized on a regular basis.

We must talk about the crisis that is happening across the Americas and address the root causes forcing individuals to flee their homes to seek asylum. #CNN

author: Adriano Espaillat
text:
